ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There s also one in Greater Faydark, I think just east of Kelethin...  when I accidentally found it, there was about 5 or 6 other people around, but I
ygData.messageBody:
> > These spells teleport the caster only to those specified locations, I
> > believe that they take you to those triangular pillar formations that
> are
> > located in the various zones but only being 15 means I have never tested
>
> > this.
>
> Ah! So that's what those things are for! I saw one of them in the
> Karanas somewhere, and of course there's one across the bridge on
> Erud. It would make a lot of sense if they are portals for
> teleportation.

There's also one in Greater Faydark, I think just east of Kelethin... when
I accidentally found it, there was about 5 or 6 other people around, but I
never really got the chance to ask what the "towers" were for, because an
orc came up from behind me and hacked me to pieces (I was a Lv2 High Elf
Wizard at the time).. :)

Callayadin
